TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit StrongNameIdentityPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission
Public NotInheritable Class StrongNameIdentityPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission
public ref class StrongNameIdentityPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission

summary.span: Defines the identity permission for strong names.

span.span: Defines the identity permission for strong names.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不會使用身分識別的權限。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used. > > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別的權限不能有權限狀態的值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 在.NET Framework 2.0 或更新版本中，身分識別的權限可以有任何權限狀態的值。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 這表示在 2.0 版和更新版本中，身分識別的權限具有相同的行為，做為實作的權限介面。This means that in version 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface. 也就是身分識別的要求一定會成功，不論的身分識別的組件中，如果組件授與完全信任。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. 使用確認呼叫程式碼是在特定的強式名稱程式碼組件中。Use to confirm that the calling code is in a particular strong-named code assembly. 完整要求堆疊中的所有組件具有正確的辨識項，以便滿足需求時，才會成功。Full demands for succeed only if all the assemblies in the stack have the correct evidence to satisfy the demand. 連結要求使用屬性立即呼叫端沒有正確的辨識項時，才會成功。Link demands that use the attribute succeed only if the immediate caller has the correct evidence. 強式名稱識別為基礎的密碼編譯公開金鑰稱為 「 二進位大型物件 (BLOB)，它會選擇性地結合特定的組件的版本與名稱。A strong name identity is based on a cryptographic public key called a binary large object (BLOB), which is optionally combined with the name and version of a specific assembly. 索引鍵定義唯一的命名空間，並提供此名稱為正版，所以名稱的定義必須由相對應的私密金鑰所簽署的組件中的強式驗證。The key defines a unique namespace and provides strong verification that the name is genuine, because the definition of the name must be in an assembly that is signed by the corresponding private key. 請注意，強式名稱金鑰的有效性不依存的信任關係，或任何索引鍵一定要發行的憑證。Note that the validity of the strong name key is not dependent on a trust relationship or on any certificate necessarily being issued for the key. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，要求的識別權限會生效，即使在呼叫組件是完全受信任。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是說，即使呼叫組件包含完全信任，如果組件不符合要求的準則就會失敗識別權限的要求。That is, even if the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 在.NET Framework 版本 2.0 和更新版本，要求識別權限都是沒有效率，如果呼叫的組件具有完全信任。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 這可確保所有的權限的一致性，並減少識別權限做為特殊案例的處理方式。This ensures consistency for all permissions and eliminates the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. 如需強式名稱的完整說明，請參閱參考頁面。For a complete description of strong names, see the reference page. 如需有關強式名稱組件的詳細資訊，請參閱[強式名稱組件](~/docs/framework/app-domains/strong-named-assemblies.md)。For more information about strong-named assemblies, see [Strong-Named Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/strong-named-assemblies.md). 類別用來定義的存取類型的公用成員的強式名稱需求。The class is used to define strong-name requirements for accessing the public members of a type. 屬性可以用來定義強式名稱組件層級的需求。The attribute can be used to define strong-name requirements at the assembly level. 在.NET Framework 2.0 或更新版本中，您也可以使用屬性來指定該組件中的所有非公用類型的另一個組件中可見。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, you can also use the attribute to specify that all nonpublic types in that assembly are visible to another assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Friend Assemblies](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/df0c70ea-2c2a-4bdc-9526-df951ad2d055) (Friend 組件)。For more information, see [Friend Assemblies](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/df0c70ea-2c2a-4bdc-9526-df951ad2d055).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會建立完全限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`權限。Creates either a fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` permission. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別的權限不能有權限狀態的值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 在.NET Framework 2.0 或更新版本中，身分識別的權限可以有任何權限狀態的值。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 這表示在 2.0 版和更新版本中，身分識別的權限具有相同的行為，做為實作的權限介面。This means that in version 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface. 也就是身分識別的要求一定會成功，不論的身分識別的組件中，如果組件授與完全信任。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別權限的要求是有效的即使是完全受信任的呼叫組件。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是說，雖然呼叫組件具有完全信任，但識別權限的要求會失敗組件不符合要求的準則。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 在.NET Framework 版本 2.0 和更新版本，要求識別權限都是沒有效率，如果呼叫的組件具有完全信任。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 如此可確保所有的權限，不會識別權限的特殊情況的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. 使用這個建構函式的權限狀態值建立比對沒有強式名稱識別權限。Use this constructor with a permission state value of to create an identity permission that matches no strong names. 如果您後續將和屬性、 特定的強式名稱身分識別可以由權限。If you subsequently set the and properties, a specific strong name identity can be represented by the permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用建構函式。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CPP/strongnameidentity.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CS/strongnameidentity.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/VB/strongnameidentity.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `name`和`version`參數可以是`null`只當公開金鑰用來識別組件。The `name` and `version` parameters can be `null` only when the public key is used to identify the assembly. 空字串 ("") 不應取代`null`。An empty string ("") should not be used in place of `null`. 如果`name`為空字串，就會擲回。If `name` is an empty string, an is thrown. 如需有關名稱和版本號碼的組件的詳細資訊，請參閱[強式名稱組件](~/docs/framework/app-domains/strong-named-assemblies.md)。For more information on names and version numbers of assemblies, see [Strong-Named Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/strong-named-assemblies.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用建構函式。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一份權限表示與原始的權限資源相同的存取權。A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的行為方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. 此範例中的最佳使用是建置並執行整個範例，以及檢視其輸出。The best use for this example is to build and execute the entire example, and view its output. > [!NOTE] > 程式碼範例會顯示不可示範其使用之方法的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，權限類別的方法所使用的安全性基礎結構。它們通常無法用在應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CPP/strongnameidentity.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CS/strongnameidentity.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/VB/strongnameidentity.vb#5)]

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission, or if the intersection is empty.

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission, or if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會描述一組共同兩者描述的作業的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 兩個相同的強式名稱身分識別的權限的交集是相同的權限。The intersection of two identical strong name identity permissions is the same permission. 交集的兩個不同 （沒有萬用字元） 的運算式是空的權限。The intersection of two different (not wildcard) expressions is an empty permission. 交集的萬用字元運算式和比對的強式名稱是強式名稱。The intersection of a wildcard expression and a matching strong name is the strong name. 比對的兩個萬用字元運算式的交集是較長，更具體的兩個運算式。The intersection of two wildcard expressions that match is the longer, more specific of the two expressions. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用的結果方法時，如何不使用的方法。The following code example shows the results of the use of the method, not how to use the method. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. 此範例中的最佳使用是建置並執行整個範例，以及檢視其輸出。The best use for this example is to build and execute the entire example, and view its output. > [!NOTE] > 程式碼範例會顯示不可示範其使用之方法的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，權限類別的方法所使用的安全性基礎結構。它們通常無法用在應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CPP/strongnameidentity.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CS/strongnameidentity.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/VB/strongnameidentity.vb#4)]

summary.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前權限會指定一組完全包含所指定的權限的作業，目前的權限會是所指定權限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，相等的其他屬性，與身分識別內含的萬用字元運算式 MyCompany.MyDepartment.\* 屬性識別為與身分識別的子集MyCompany.MyDepartment.MyFile 屬性.For example, the other properties being equal, an identity with the property containing the wildcard expression MyCompany.MyDepartment.\* is identified as a subset of an identity with the property MyCompany.MyDepartment.MyFile. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用的結果方法時，如何不使用的方法。The following code example shows the results of the use of the method, not how to use the method. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. 此範例中的最佳使用是建置並執行整個範例，以及檢視其輸出。The best use for this example is to build and execute the entire example, and view its output. > [!NOTE] > 程式碼範例會顯示不可示範其使用之方法的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，權限類別的方法所使用的安全性基礎結構。它們通常無法用在應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CPP/strongnameidentity.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CS/strongnameidentity.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/VB/strongnameidentity.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性可以是完全相同的名稱，或最後一個位置中的萬用字元可以修改; 例如，MyCompany.MyDepartment.MyFile 和 MyCompany.MyDepartment.\* 是有效的名稱。The value of the property can be an exact name or can be modified by a wildcard character in the final position; for example, both MyCompany.MyDepartment.MyFile and MyCompany.MyDepartment.\* are valid names. 如果您嘗試設定屬性設為空字串 ("")、就會擲回。If you attempt to set the property to an empty string (""), an is thrown.

param.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果是權限，表示代表的所有作業目前的權限和指定的權限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 傳遞其中一個權限的任何要求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. 權限的聯集和`null`是不是使用權限`null`。The union of a permission and `null` is the permission that is not `null`. 權限的聯集和該權限的子集是包含其他的權限。The union of a permission and a subset of that permission is the permission that contains the other. 任何其他組合會產生擲回例外狀況。Any other combination results in an exception being thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用的結果方法時，如何不使用的方法。The following code example shows the results of the use of the method, not how to use the method. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. 此範例中的最佳使用是建置並執行整個範例，以及檢視其輸出。The best use for this example is to build and execute the entire example, and view its output. > [!NOTE] > 程式碼範例會顯示不可示範其使用之方法的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，權限類別的方法所使用的安全性基礎結構。它們通常無法用在應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CPP/strongnameidentity.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/CS/strongnameidentity.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission/VB/strongnameidentity.vb#3)]

exception.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

exception.span: -or- The two permissions are not equal and one is a subset of the other.

span.span: -or- The two permissions are not equal and one is a subset of the other.
